resources.string: What time is it acceptable for your child to wake up?
Your child can know what Hour it is just by counting the clocks on the bottom, if you want them off, here you go.
Nap Mode Enabled allows you to add a Second Sooth Mode during the day.
Kid Clock has a night time mode that uses soothing colors to promote a calm and relaxing environment. Tell us what time is bedtime and Wake Advisor will do the rest!
